rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0001
rows.name:
My Lady... Over there.
The capital's standing army.

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0002
rows.name: I see 'em.

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0003
rows.name:
Let's keep our distance, yeah?
Best let sleeping Gogols lie.

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0004
rows.name: Good call...

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0005
rows.name: Be not alarmed.

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0006
rows.name:
The troops that captured us were
Superbian military, yes, but from the
Gulan regiment.

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0007
rows.name: Those aren't the same?

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0008
rows.name: Quite different, in fact.

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0009
rows.name:
One can learn many things while in a
Divine Beast battleship's brig, and I made good
use of the opportunity.

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0010
rows.name:
Damn. They chucked me into solitary,
so I don't know anything...

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0011
rows.name:
It does seem they have separate
procedures for Blades and Drivers...

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0012
rows.name:
In any case, once I abandoned thoughts
of staging a break-out, I did make sure
to keep my ears open for intelligence.

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0013
rows.name: Did you hear anything else?

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0014
rows.name: Let me think...

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0015
rows.name:
The soldiers over there are, as I said
previously, from the capital's garrison...

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0016
rows.name:
but those other ones actually belong to
the First Imperial Guard, 2nd Battalion.

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0017
rows.name:
Huh?
What's the difference?

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0018
rows.name:
Beyond the bridge is Hadashal Palace,
the imperial residence. Therefore...

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0019
rows.name:
Oh, I've got it! The palace guards
belong to a different unit. Of course!

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0020
rows.name:
Indeed. Then, above the Imperial Guard
rank and file, you have the Carraig
special guard unit...

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0021
rows.name:
And higher yet, the Special Inquisitor...
The Flamebringer herself.

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0022
rows.name: Wow...

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0023
rows.name:
Armies, man. I could never deal with
all this hierarchy crap.

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0024
rows.name:
Ever heard the expression,
"know thy enemy"...?

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0025
rows.name: What else should I ask?

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0026
rows.name: Nia, how was Iira organized?

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0027
rows.name: Got any other good ones, Byakko?

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0101
rows.name:
Iira...?
It was all centered around Shin.
Not exactly structured, though.

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0102
rows.name: But we all had our assignments.

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0103
rows.name: What was yours, Nia?

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0104
rows.name: I was...

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0105
rows.name: Naptime specialist?

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0106
rows.name:
Shut it!
I was, uh, general support.

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0107
rows.name:
I hadn't been there long, so I mostly
just helped out with whatever.

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0108
rows.name:
Hah.
Not much of a change, then.

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0109
rows.name: It is as you say.

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0110
rows.name:
Stop making it sound like I'm some
useless layabout!

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0111
rows.name:
I mean, I can make ruska dumplings
and stuff, so...

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0112
rows.name:
Well then, maybe we could cook
something together?

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0113
rows.name:
M-mhm...
OK, you're on!

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0114
rows.name: My Lady, are you sure that's...

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0115
rows.name:
Both of you'll sing a different song
when I stuff your faces with my food!

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0116
rows.name: *sigh*...

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0117
rows.name:
You had best steel yourself,
Rex-sama.

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0118
rows.name:
My lady's cooking is not what anyone
would call "conventionally tasty"...

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0119
rows.name:
Ugh...
Maybe I shouldn't have riled her up...

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0201
rows.name:
The smallest unit in the Superbian
army's structure is the ten-soldier
decade.

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0202
rows.name:
It includes eight foot soldiers alongside
the squad leader and a deputy.

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0203
rows.name:
Six to ten of these decades can then
form a unit called a century.

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0204
rows.name: But eight is the usual number.

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0205
rows.name: Hah, neat...

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0206
rows.name: Mm...

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0207
rows.name:
...Rex-sama.
You did ask for a, "good one," correct?

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0208
rows.name: I did.

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0209
rows.name:
Would you not say that was
a "good one," then?

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0210
rows.name: Uh, which part?

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0211
rows.name:
I said that commonly, eight decades
form a century. Eighty men...and yet,
they are a century.

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0212
rows.name: Ohhhh, now I get it...

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0213
rows.name:
Rex...
He's done his best, so just
throw him a bone, will ya?

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0214
rows.name:
Ah, yeah, no, that was a very good one!
Uh-huh, very good.

rows.label: kizunatalk004_msg0215
rows.name: I have doubts about your sincerity...
